name: Square Game (ynkie)
description:
a small fast paced game that i made in 3-4 days.

in this game, you control a square that needs to reach the goal of every level.

use the arrow keys to move the square, and the up key to jump.

if you want to restart an level, just press R. and if you want to go to the main menu, just press M and it's done.

it's very short, you could complete it in less than 1 minute, my highscore is around 20.

anyways, i hope you enjoy it :)
